original_title: โอ้! มายโกสต์ คุณผีช่วย
overview: This comedy is about two best friends, one very pretty the other not so much. When one friend passes away, she returns as a ghost to be with her old pal, and things get complicated when they have to share the same body.
tagline: When you best buddy in an already dead buddy.
title: Oh My Ghost
